name: Mealie's Prison Break
description:
Run Player.exe to start.

Arrow keys to move, Z to start/accept/attack, X to jump, Press C to use a charged attack. Down arrow is Crouch, CTRL to Dash, you can also crouch dash! 

Escape from Prison... If you dare...!
Asset sources:
https://clembod.itch.io/warrior-free-animation-set
https://clembod.itch.io/cultist-enemy-pack
